name: Air Hockey Simulator (Mutcholoko)
description:
Ever wanted to play Air Hockey digitally in a simple but fun coop game? Yeah, me too!

I always wanted to make a game like this, so I took the opportunity to not only make that, but also to get a little more practice with Unity Development. This game is really simple, but it is quite fun to play in a party with your friends. For now, there is only local coop.
